site.description: Epsilon is a platform of task-specific languages and tools for model management. Epsilon provides languages for tasks such as model transformation, validation, comparison, merging and code generation. It also includes Eclipse-based development tools for the languages and ANT tasks for executing them in the context of complex workflows. Additional features include support live validation, repairing, and scripting of models in EMF and GMF-based editors.

category-def.name: Epsilon Core
category-def.label: Epsilon Core
category-def.description: Parsers and execution engines for languages of the Epsilon platform.

category-def.name: Epsilon Core Development Tools
category-def.label: Epsilon Core Development Tools
category-def.description: Development tools (editors, launch configurations, debuggers etc.) for the languages of the Epsilon platform.

category-def.name: Epsilon EMF Integration
category-def.label: Epsilon EMF Integration
category-def.description: Support for managing EMF-based models with languages of the Epsilon platform.

category-def.name: Epsilon GMF Integration
category-def.label: Epsilon GMF Integration
category-def.description: Support for developing GMF-based editors (Eugenia), and for refactoring models in GMF-based editors using the Epsilon Wizard Language.

category-def.name: Human Usable Textual Notation (HUTN)
category-def.label: Human Usable Textual Notation (HUTN)
category-def.description: Parser and development tools for the OMG Human Usable Textual Notation (HUTN).

category-def.name: Model Monitoring
category-def.label: Model Monitoring
category-def.description: Tools for monitoring and maintaining the consistency of EMF models in the workspace.
